channel.title: Need help with ppl connecting to my server
channel.description: hi im kinda new at this my client and server run just fine but i am having problems with setting up my no-ip service i have my no-ip i just need help making it so ppl can connect to my server idk how to do it can somebody please help me out id greatly appreciate it thanks.

item.title: Need help with ppl connecting to my server

@ta1nt3d wrote:

i have comcast also and a netgear router if that helps u guys a little with the probs im having

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ppl connecting to my server
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Some routers, such as 2wire, actually require you to log in with your providers name, and type your providers password, i had to phone the provider to get mine switched because of this, adn the correct spelling of a router isn’t important to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ppl connecting to my server
item.dc:creator: @nick888 nick888
item.description:
@nick888 wrote:

portfoward.
type your ip in the browser
user:admin pass:admin
then click on application& gaming or portfoward single
make internal and external ports 43594
leave everything else the same except check enable
There you are! Hope it helps!

Read full topic
